item.title: Getting started with titan
item.description: Installation or Setup # Detailed instructions on getting titan set up or installed. Initialising a Titan Graph # With the appropriate storage backend running a new titan graph can be initialised via: graph = TitanFactory.open("config.properties"); Wehere config.properties defines several configurations relevant to the storage backend. Titan provides some sample configs in its downloadable package. For example conf/titan-cassandra.properties A shorthand can also be used when you want to ignore most configuration options:
